ygData.subject: Arriving From Victory
ygData.msgSnippet: Shockwave: Shockwave landed outside of Hell Beast and Megatron s ice caves. Transforming to biped mode, he remembered the cold but made no show of irritation.

Subject: Arriving From Victory
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Shockwave:




Shockwave landed outside of Hell Beast and Megatron's ice caves.  
Transforming to biped mode, he remembered the cold but made no show of 
irritation.

Opening a comm. link with Hell Beast, he intoned.  "This is Shockwave.  We 
must speak.  Lower your defenses and let me in quickly.  The intense cold 
outside of your base is not good for my internal circuitry."
